review_text: We loved our stay at this beach cottage. It was perfect for our family of 4, including 2 older teenagers. The view is amazing and we loved sitting on the bench in front of the cabin to gaze at the beach and ocean. The location was great. An easy walk to shops, restaurants, and beach access. The neighborhood is so close to everything in Newport but quiet. The cottage had everything we needed and was very clean. We made a simple meal while we were there and had everything we needed. Gina was very responsive and worked with us to make check-in and check-out easy. We will be back again!
Amazing stay, highly recommend!

We had a great stay: short but very satisfying! Everything was top notch. Beach has to be accessed by leaving the property and going 100 yards or so to get to stairs! It's physically taxing so be prepared!
EVERYTHING was very convenient! The amenities are well thought out: the various chargers, folding chairs, a frisbee and the supplies of basics, bathroom was immaculate!
Highest marks! Thank you!
Such a fun place! The weather could have been better, but that‚Äôs nothing we could control. The location was amazing and the place really cute. Highly recommend!

I don‚Äôt think we ever closed the curtains. From sitting at the window staring out to sitting on the bench outside watching the sunset the view was so spectacular. Area was super walkable with tons of shops, restaurants, and cafes. Will definitely stay again.

Beach Bum Bungalow #7 was very clean and matched the description/pictures perfectly. The view was outstanding and the area was great for walking around town. Gina was extremely fast with responding to questions, which was very appreciated. The only negative is that the shower is small and tight for those that are tall or larger built. My teen son is 6'1" and had to shower on his knees to fit under the showerhead. While it made us chuckle, it may not be that easy for others to handle. Other than that, we absolutely loved our stay! Thank you for such a lovely place.
We had such a peaceful and relaxing girls trip. The bungalow was absolutely adorable and beautifully decorated. Thanks so much for sharing with us!
Great location, close to the beach and restaurants. The bungalow was clean and inviting.

My husband and I stayed for a week with our 4 year old and 1.5 year old and had a great time. Beautiful view, quick walk to the beach and shops, and the kids loved all of the decorations to look at outside
I was a very cute little cabin over looking the ocean, within walking distance to coffee shops and restaurants. What more could you ask for
Quaint, cute space with a wonderful picture window ocean view. Walkable to the beach and town. Gina was so kind, flexible and responsive. We really enjoyed our stay!

we booked this place for my dad and younger son. This was my dad's first trip since my mom died two years ago. The Oregon Coastbis full of memories for him so we did not know if even his adult grandsons could lure him out here (we live here). This bungalow was the icing on the cake. A beautiful peaceful place he had never stayed where he could build new memories. The quiet calm location so close to amazing restaraunts and the beach is absolutely perfect. The cozy homelike atmosphere in this historic cottage with indescribably stunning views and a kind thoughtful host makes this a place our family will book again and again.
Great spot!

What a great place! Restaurants and shopping are super close walking distance and the ocean view is right outside your door. Leave your window open at night and you‚Äôll fall asleep to the ocean waves. We will be back!

A delight! Amazing views, great price. Will definitely come back again.

This historic beach cottage has wonderful ocean views plus great walking access from cliff to beach and to Nye Beach restaurants and bakeries. Very enjoyable and comfortable stay.

This is our second visit to the Beach Bum Cottages. The view from the living room window is AMAZING...so even if it's raining and windy, you can sit inside and watch and listen to the waves. If it's dry, there's a little bench outside that keeps you warm in the radiant sunshine.
It's super cozy and cute.
The beds are comfortable. We were there for almost a week and our back didn't hurt. (YAY!)
The kitchen is small but very functional and well stocked. We cooked several meals and ate looking at the ocean.
It's a short walk to a paved trail down to the sand. You can walk all the to the Agate Beach area or you can walk to the Harbor.
The Nye Beach area is quaint and not as commercial as the rest of Newport.
THANK YOU for a great stay! I am confident we will be back.
We LOVED this little beach cabin. the view and easy walk to the beach was unbeatable. We hope to return! Great memories were made.
Magical maritime bliss!
What a great place! The view of the ocean and the sound of the waves was amazing!

my friends and I absolutely LOVED this airbnb! We only stayed 1 night during our costal road trip, but we were wanting to stay longer when it was time to leave! Views can not get any better. Location was great, we could walk to so many places. We would definitely recommend this place and this town in general!
Newport Cottage was a beautiful place to stay.

Great location!
a window looking right out to the ocean. Host provided many little extras (like chocolateüòä) Very tastefully decorated and quiet.

I absolutely loved my stay here. The view was incredible, and they went above and beyond to provide anything you might need. My favorite touch was the personal recommendations they suggested! This place is just perfect! The view, proximity to town, the kitchen...everything is just perfect.
I had the need to communicate with Gina a couple of times about some things - she was super responsive and helpful every time.
We go to the coast often. Gina's place will be one of the first on my list to see if it's available.

Very clean, private cabin. Amazing views, beach, shops and restaurants are walkable. Super nice weekend getaway. Very cozy cottage with a beautiful view of the ocean. Would definitely stay again when visiting Newport

My partner and I really enjoyed our stay! We loved the open ocean view and the peacefulness of the location! Little cottage with cute decor. Wonderful Ocean View right out the front window. as described, had basic kitchen equipment we even made meals for company. in the night Beach neighborhood which is fantastic for a Newport visit.
great place for wife and daughter

We stayed 3 nights and was honestly sad to leave. The space is perfect for two, but it could also easily accommodate a third traveler (just note as another reviewer indicated there are no doors on the bedrooms - which was not a problem for us!) Lively cottage. Great view!

Nice little bungalow right above the beach with a great view.
Great view, can‚Äôt beat it!

Our family of 4 (including a toddler) found the cottage to be so welcoming, cozy, and comfortable. We loved the fireplace. It had everything we needed and more. The location couldn‚Äôt be better. We would definitely recommend and plan to stay here again.
A delightful place to stay! We loved sitting at the table and drinking tea with a full view of the ocean. The neighborhood is charming, and Gina is an excellent host!
Love waking up to the view! Great stay, would book again when in town :)
Great family vacation destination.
It was the perfect cozy cabin weekend with amazing views of the ocean. Close to a lot of places for drinks and food!
We loved staying here! What an amazing view! The cliff behind gives a tremendous view of the Ocean as well as offering privacy from all the people on the beach.

All the expectations were met from the minute we arrived! Convenient private parking, easy access, very neat and clean, and we were absolutely blown away by the view in #7! What a beautiful place to stay on our mini vacation! There were so many things to see just by walking a short distance in and around Nye Beach... but we spent most of our days taking long walks up and down the beach, and then returning to our cozy retreat in the evening, playing guitar, reading books and enjoying delectable meals from our local finds in Nye Beach. We also took a short drive to Yaquina Head Lighthouse, then down to visit shops-n-sea lions down on the bay front, stopped for some fish-n-chips, and had to sample some decadent chocolate from the confectionery. Great place to stay. Very peaceful and just as described.

Great cottage!

Really great location and a beautiful ocean view.
Beautiful location, comfy home, I would stay again for sure!

Lovely view, cozy cottage
